Question.Subject: whn i vsit sum websites t says 'sorry ths website s nt availbl fr u r country' i'm frm india wt 2 do?
Question.Content: when i visit some websites it says''sorry this website is not available for u r country' i'm from india, i want to get into those websites what 2 do??? Egs: in CBS.com some part of the site is accessible to only US & UK...... is there any other way so that i can use the site frm india??
Question.ChosenAnswer: same problem here all you need is to change your IP to an USA IP go to :http://www.ultrareach.com/download_en.htm and download a small tool (free) or go to http://www.proxy4free.com/page1.html it contain a lot of free websites that will let you browse through them to blocked websites

Answer.Content: There's not really much you can do since your ISP is monitored by the government of the country. The only thing I could think of was to try and find a mirror to the site or try a proxy.
